name: homelands
description: A comprehensive content pack inspired by MTG Homelands (1995), covering slowtrip cantrips, tribal themes (Faeries, Minotaurs, Wizards, Vampires), poison counters and removal, world enchantments (Koskun Falls, Mystic Decree), anti-tribal suppression (An-Zerrin Ruins), and set-specific curios (Apocalypse Chime, Didgeridoo, Serrated Arrows).

SLOWTRIP: Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
FAERIE_TRICKS: Target Faerie gains protection from {PROTECTION_COLOR} until end of turn.
Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying.
MINOTAUR_THINGS: Create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.
VAMPIRE_STUFF: Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature dies this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
ARROW_EFFECT: Remove an arrowhead counter from this artifact: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
WORLD_RULE: (This is a world enchantment. When a world permanent enters the battlefield, if another world permanent is on the battlefield, that permanent's controller sacrifices the older one.)
